mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORKING_PARTY VALUES( SEQ_WORKING_PARTY_NO.NEXTVAL,#{writer_id},#{pathOne},#{pathAll, typeHandler = WalkingTypeHandler},#{contant}, DEFAULT,#{start_date}, #{start_time},#{estimated_time},#{distance}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT wp.*,m.nick_name nick_name , m.profile_re_name profile , s.avg avg FROM WORKING_PARTY wp JOIN MEMBER m ON writer_id = id JOIN (SELECT recive_id, avg(score) avg from score group by recive_id) s ON writer_id = s.recive_id WHERE writer_id LIKE (#{id}) AND (STAT = '모집중') OR (STAT = '마감') ORDER BY start_time

SELECT wp.*,m.nick_name nick_name , m.profile_re_name profile , s.avg avg FROM WORKING_PARTY wp JOIN MEMBER m ON writer_id = id JOIN (SELECT recive_id, avg(score) avg from score group by recive_id) s ON writer_id = s.recive_id WHERE (START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{date}) AND TO_DATE(#{date})+ 0.99999) AND writer_id LIKE (#{id}) AND (STAT = '모집중') OR (STAT = '마감') ORDER BY start_time
